mapper.select: SELECT user_email FROM user WHERE user_email = "${emailAddress}" LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_email, user_password, user_name, user_picture_url, user_sex, user_birthday) VALUE ("${newUser.userEmail}","${newUser.userPassword}", "${newUser.userName}", "${newUser.userPictureUrl}", ${newUser.userSex}, "${newUser.userBirthday}")
